summary: An email from a forensic psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center providing a morning update on suicide watch and psychological observation status for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, noting he is on suicide watch and no other inmates are under psych observation. The email includes an out-of-office notice for the sender.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 and placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

connections.description: LT, as a forensic psychologist at the MCC, is responsible for monitoring and reporting on Epstein's suicide watch and psychological status.

events.title: Morning Suicide Watch Update
events.description: Forensic psychologist LT reports that Jeffrey Epstein is on suicide watch and there are no other inmates under psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on July 24, 2019.
The email confirms Epstein's inmate number as 76318-054.
The forensic psychologist providing the update was scheduled to be out of the office from July 22 through August 7, 2019.
The document is an official government email containing sensitive information regarding inmate status.
No other inmates were under psychological observation at the time of the report.
